snippet: With Kathleen Turner sometimes narrating, Mr. Rioult’s company presents “Women on the Edge ... Unsung Heroines of the Trojan War” at the Joyce.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews Pascal Rioult dance program Women on the Edge ... Unsung Heroines of the Trojan War, featuring premiere of piece Cassandra's Curse, at Joyce Theater; show is performed by Rioult Dance NY and includes narration by actress Kathleen Turner at select performances.
lead_paragraph: With Kathleen Turner sometimes narrating, Mr. Rioult’s company presents “Women on the Edge ... Unsung Heroines of the Trojan War” at the Joyce.

headline.main: Review: Pascal Rioult Turns Greek Tragedies Into Antiwar Statements
headline.print_headline: Protesting Wars, Both Ancient and Modern

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Women on the Edge ... Unsung Heroines of the Trojan War (Dance)
